In England, in the seven days to 11 March, there were 32,975 new confirmed cases (58.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 March, there were 35,447 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (2,472 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 March is 3,736,240 (6,637.8 cases per 100,000 population).
